abstract: Ford Motor Company workers approve four-year labor agreement their union negotiated, choosing to accept terms rather than jeopardize hefty bonuses and thousands of new jobs in an uncertain economy.
snippet: Though workers showed they were not happy with the labor agreement, they eventually approved it rather than risk hefty bonuses and thousands of new jobs.
lead_paragraph: Though workers showed they were not happy with the labor agreement, they eventually approved it rather than risk hefty bonuses and thousands of new jobs.

headline.main: Efficiency Gains Help Offset Costs for Ford in New Contract
headline.print_headline: Efficiency Gains Help Offset Costs for Ford in New Contract
